definitions.body: [[כסא דין]] throne of judgment Pr 20:8; [[משׁמים השׁמעת דין]] from heaven thou didst cause judgment to be heard Ps 76:9.

cause, plea, [[בין דין לדין]] between plea and plea De 17:8; [[דין דין]] plead a cause Je 5:28, Je 22:16, Je 30:13; [[עשׂה דין]] maintain, the cause Ps 9:5, Ps 140:13; [[ידע דין]] consider the cause Pr 29:7; [[דין לפניו]] the cause is before him Job 35:14; [[שׁנה דין]] change the cause Pr 31:5; [[לְהַטּוֹת מִדִּין דַּלִּים]] Is 10:2; [[דין יתום]] Je 5:28; [[דין כל בני חֲלוֹף]] Pr 31:8.
judgment, condemnation, [[דין רשׁע]] judgment of the wicked Job 36:17; [[דין ומשׁפט]] judgment and justice v:Job 36:17.
strife, [[דין רקלון]] Pr 22:10 (legal strife, law-suit Str).
government, [[דת ודין]] law and government Es 1:13.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Note.—[[לְמַעַן תֵּדְעוּן שַׁדּיּ֠ן]] Job 19:29 is variously explained. (1) AV RV that ye may know there is a judgment follow Aq Symm Theod, so De Da, in interpreting [[שׁ]] relative + [[דִּין]] judgment, but [[שׁ]] is unknown to the dialect of Job and [[דִּין]] is used only in Elihu section. (2) LXX rds. u(/lh, or i)/sxuv (i.e. [[שַׁדַּי]] (cf. Job 29:5 LXX) ? or [[שׁׂד]]?), & Qr [[שַׁדּוּן]], indicating ancient uncertainty and a corrupt text. (3) Ew Di rd. [[שַׁדַּי]] the Almighty, which accords with usage of Job. (4) Siegf [[כִּי שֻׁדָָּדוּ]] (doubtfully).
